data.text: SMARTTOP Eyeglasses Retention for Cycling

I'm not selling anything, and i have no affiliation with this company. I'm simply putting this out as PSA for those, like me, who have to wear glasses when riding. A guy that worked for me had some, and in turn turned me on to them. These are the SMARTTOP Eyeglasses retention. You can buy them on Amazon for just under $6 for a pack of 12. They are soft rubber, and can be reused. I bought two packs a year ago thinking id be going through them, but I'm still just using a few from the first opened pack. As you can see in my picture, they simply slip onto your glasses, and sit behind your ear. Because they are soft they dont irritate my ear while wearing them, and they are easily adjusted. I use to wear the Chums eyeglass holder, but they annoyed me, and sometimes would mess with my helmet adjustment. Again, I don't care if you buy them or not. I just wanted folks to know who might benefit from them. Admin, if this is not allowed, I apologize. https://a.co/d/0MG1did
I use something similar to ride too!
